sourcesContent:
Cálculadora CDB

Taxa CDI: {{ taxCDI }}%

Taxa Banco: {{ taxBank }}%

Valor Final do CDB: {{ liquidValue | currency:'BRL' }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { taxCDI: number = 0.9; taxBank: number = 108; initialValue: number | null = null; months: number | null = null; liquidValue: number | null = null; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } calculate(): void { const url = `https://localhost:7123/api/calculatecdb/calculate?initialValue=${this.initialValue}&mounths=${this.months}`; this.http.get(url).subscribe((response: any) => { this.liquidValue = response.liquidValue; }); } }
